text: Much is expected from the Warrior Without Equal’s daughter, but the ravishing Lü Ji fights with both the skill and ferocity to live up to the Lü name.
An untamable woman of the Trieu Dynasty who fights to see her people free.
There is nothing to be gained from oppressing the people; they, ultimately, will decide our legacy.
Thirsting for vengeance, she rebelled against the Bandit Queen.
When your eye for banditry and mischief is this good, you don’t need both eyes.
Famed for setting the ambush that killed Sun Jian, Huang Zu guards the Yangtze, lying in wait and striking at the most opportune moment.
Pang De is an unrelenting force, whose avowed enemies know they must face him sooner or later.
A tiger does not father nor marry a dog. The Silver Treasure of the prideful Guan Yu is a tigress, and must be treated accordingly.
Although he lost one hand, he was one of the few who survived from duel with Lubu.
